title: Mister Schmidt Watch Face Lite
summary: Mister Schmidt gets up again.- An amazing watch face.
developerAddress:
Timefaces
Danziger Platz 4

description: Every new day: "Mister Schmidt gets up again." On the way to the office, intently focussing at his desk or comfortably watching television with his Renate on the sofa. This watch face shows everyday routine, which is sometimes surprising, of Mister Schmidt's life.All illustrations were first created in loving detail out of old paper by artist Ljuba Stille and then digitalised.The Mister Schmidt Watch Face Lite includes:- a watch face for smart watches (Android Wear)- a homescreen widget for smart phones
descriptionHTML:
Every new day: "Mister Schmidt gets up again." On the way to the office, intently focussing at his desk or comfortably watching television with his Renate on the sofa. This watch face shows everyday routine, which is sometimes surprising, of Mister Schmidt's life.

All illustrations were first created in loving detail out of old paper by artist Ljuba Stille and then digitalised.

The Mister Schmidt Watch Face Lite includes:
- a watch face for smart watches (Android Wear)
- a homescreen widget for smart phones
comments: Making ya boy work the weekends is just a shame, let him go to the movies and dinner with the wife! Otherwise, great watchface, I feel like me and Herr Schmidt have a connection. He knows me.

Very innovative It is a very interesting and extremely innovative idea. Nevertheless there is a definite code improvement. The current version is heavily draining the battery. Hopefully, the next version is getting better.
Nice, but... I have only one complaint......no date! Or am I missing a setting somewhere?
Poor Mr Schmith It would be nice to see him doing some weekend activities but otherwise beautifully done watch face
Adorable Didn't test it yet on my watch but I'm using it on my phone and is absolutely adorable. It was easy to set up and works flawlessly
recentChanges: - shifting lunch time for daily routine
